sen.j: 藤原 清輔（ふじわら の きよすけ、長治元年（1104年） - 治承元年6月20日 (旧暦)（1177年7月17日））は、平安時代末期の公家・歌人。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Kiyosuke, 1104 - July 17, 1177, was a court noble and poet at the end of the Heian period.

sen.j: 藤原北家藤原魚名流。
sen.e: He was of the FUJIWARA no Uona family, the Northern house of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.j: 初名は隆長。
sen.e: He was first called Takanaga.
sen.cmt: original nameはたぶん誤訳です。「初名」は歌舞伎役者などの最初の名前のことです。

sen.j: 父は藤原顕輔。
sen.e: His father was FUJIWARA no Akisuke.

sen.j: 母は高階能遠の娘。
sen.e: His mother was the daughter of TAKASHINA no Yoshito.

sen.j: 同母兄藤原顕方、異母弟に藤原重家 (刑部卿)、藤原季経が、義弟に顕昭がいる。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Akikata was his uterine elder brother, the Gyobukyo (the Chief of Justice) FUJIWARA no Shigeie and FUJIWARA no Suetsune his half brothers, and Kensho his step younger brother.

FUJIWARA no Akikata was his older brother, the Gyobukyo (the Chief of Justice) FUJIWARA no Shigeie and FUJIWARA no Suetsune his younger paternal half-brothers, and Kensho his younger step brother.

sen.j: 子に藤原清季らがいる。
sen.e: Among his children was FUJIWARA no Sayaki.
Among his children was FUJIWARA no Sayaki.

sen.j: 天養元年（1144年）、崇徳天皇より父顕輔が勅撰集『詞花和歌集』の撰集を命ぜられた。
sen.e: In 1144 his father Akisuke was commissioned by Emperor Sutoku to compile the imperial anthology, "Shika Wakashu" (the Collection of Verbal Flowers).

sen.j: 清輔もその補助に当たったが、顕輔と対立。
sen.e: While working as his father's assistant, he had differing opinions from him.

sen.j: そのためほとんど清輔の意見は採用されなかった。
sen.e: Consequently, most of his selections were not adopted.

sen.j: その後も父に疎まれ、官位には恵まれずに正四位下太皇太后宮大進（藤原多子に仕えた。）に任ぜられるにとどまった。
sen.e: Subsequently, disliked by his father, with no luck at promotion, he ended up with working for FUJIWARA no Tashi (Masaruko) who was Taikotaigogu taishin (officer of the internal palace of the Grand Empress Dowager) with Senior Forth Lower.

sen.j: 下司太皇太后宮亮に平経盛がいる。

sen.e: This could not become an imperial anthology as the emperor did not live to see it completed.

sen.j: 久寿2年（1155年）、父から人麻呂影供（ひとまろえいぐ）と六条藤家を継ぐ。
sen.e: In 1155 he took over his father as the organizer of Hitomaroeigu (the poetry contest in honor of Hitomaro) and succeeded to the Rokujo-To family.

sen.j: 御子左家の藤原俊成に対抗した。
sen.e: His rival was FUJIWARA no Toshinari of the Mikohidari house of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.j: 多くの著作を残し六条藤家歌学を確立した。
sen.e: Writing numerous books, he established the poetics of the Rokujo-To family.

sen.j: 『千載和歌集』以下の勅撰和歌集に入集。
